body.section:
The IHTSDO Classifier is a highly optimised module for performing complete or incremental classification of SNOMED CT. The IHTSDO Workbench provides support for using this classifier via in-built tasks available from within the Business Process Builder. The classifier related tasks available can be seen in
Process Builder pane showing classifier tasks
body.note: The IHTSDO Classifier requires considerable system resources - particularly memory. The Workbench's Java Virtual Machine settings need to configured for sufficient heap space - at least 1200MBytes ( -Xms1200m in the java startup script, see How to overcome memory issues? )
In order to view the results of running the classifier, ensure that the STATED_INFERREDinferred viewSTATED_INFERRED viewing option is checked in the Component Pane of the Preferences Panel.
body.section: The classifier is executed through a business process plugin and can take several minutes. Once the classifier has been run, the Normal Form results for a given concept can be shown in the component panel, by selecting the toggle.
